mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pc_autodyne(a_image , a_sketch , a_address , a_person , a_time , a_author,a_name) VALUES (#{aImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{aSketch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{aAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{aPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{aTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{aAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{aName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
